title: Lemyra melanosoma
data: Lemyra melanosoma is a moth of the family Erebidae. It was described by George Hampson in 1894. The species is found in China (including Sichuan, Yunnan, Shaanxi, Tibet, Hubei, Hunan), Pakistan, eastern India (in regions such as Kulu, Sikkim, Darjiling and the Khasi Hills) as well as in Myanmar and Thailand.[1][2][3] This Lemyra-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
